item.title: The Daily Laugh: Thursday's Guyana News Circus
item.description:
ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡¾ THE DAILY LAUGH ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡¾

Your 5-Minute Guyana News Digest

ðŸŽ­ MADURO GETS THE ULTIMATE SURPRISE PARTY

Y’all, the Americans just Uber-kidnapped an entire president. Not even DoorDash is that efficient.

What Happened: Trump sent the boys to Venezuela like it was a Black Friday sale at Courts. NicolÃ¡s Maduro got the express trip to New York he DEFINITELY didn’t book on Travelocity.

Guyana’s Response: President Ali is doing that Caribbean thing where you’re simultaneously thrilled, terrified, and trying not to laugh. He “commended Trump” which is like thanking the bouncer for removing your drunk ex from the party.

item.title: About The Daily Laugh
item.description:
About The Daily Laugh ðŸ‡¬ðŸ‡¾

Welcome to The Daily Laugh - your daily satirical roundup of Guyana’s four major newspapers.

What We Do

We read Stabroek News, Kaieteur News, Chronicle, and Guyana Times every day, then write funny commentary about the headlines. We’re not real journalists - we’re satirists who care about Guyana enough to mock its problems.

Meet CARIBSTAR

Your editor and chief troublemaker. Strong opinions, questionable judgment, excellent coffee tolerance.

item.title: Legal Disclaimer
item.description:
Legal Disclaimer & Copyright Policy

Last Updated: January 9, 2026

This Is Satire

All content on The Daily Laugh is satirical commentary on Guyana news. We’re not journalists - we’re satirists.

Fair Use & Copyright

We summarize news from Guyana’s four major newspapers under fair use principles:

  • We don’t republish full articles
  • We add substantial original commentary
  • We transform content into satire
  • We attribute sources

Not Defamation

Our satire focuses on:
